articles.description: Listen to live Sportsound commentary and follow updates as Rangers visit Viktoria Plzen in the second leg of their Champion League third qualifying round tie with a 3-0 lead.
articles.title: Viktoria Plzen vs Rangers - BBC Sport - LIVE - UEFA Champions League radio, team news, updates, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Everton sign Manchester City and England winger Jack Grealish on a season-long loan.
articles.title: Jack Grealish transfer: Everton complete loan signing of Manchester City and England winger

articles.description: Liverpool step up their bid to sign Crystal Palace and England centre-back Marc Guehi.
articles.title: Marc Guehi: Liverpool set to step up bid for Crystal Palace captain

articles.description: Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak wants to join Premier League champions Liverpool before the transfer window closes.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle United striker determined to join Liverpool

articles.description: Tottenham head coach Thomas Frank says Yves Bissouma has been left out of their Super Cup squad to face Paris St-Germain for disciplinary reasons.
articles.title: Super Cup: Yves Bissouma left out by Thomas Frank for disciplinary reasons

articles.description: A moment of silence in memory of Diogo Jota and his brother Andre Silva will be held at all Premier League matches this weekend.
articles.title: Premier League clubs to pay tribute to Diogo Jota and Andre Silva this weekend

articles.description: Alvaro Morata says he had "no choice" but to give up part of his salary in order to leave Galatasaray, as the club failed to honour certain commitments.
articles.title: Alvaro Morata: Spain captain criticises Galatasaray as loan spell ends

articles.description: Dillian Whyte says Anthony Joshua should fight Jake Paul for a lucrative purse, but insists he still has unfinished business with Joshua himself.
articles.title: Dillian Whyte vs Moses Itauma: 'The Bodysnatcher' encourages Anthony Joshua to fight Jake Paul

articles.description: Tottenham are exploring a deal for Crystal Palace and England forward Eberechi Eze.
articles.title: Eberechi Eze transfer: Tottenham exploring a deal for Crystal Palace forward

articles.description: Former Premier League referee David Coote given eight-week ban by the FA for his comments about ex-Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: David Coote: Former Premier League ref given two-month ban by FA
